title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: The bug report states that an invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) is not being rejected when it should be.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design, it is accepted and stored without any validation.
EB: (2) The date value should have been validated by the user interface (UI) or the model before being stored.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the report design interface.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string that does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format.
3. Save the report design.
4. Verify that the invalid date/time value is accepted and stored without any validation.
